name: Existence: Deep Skies
description:
Existence: Deep Skies is a semi-automated semi-incremental and semi-idle game, you WILL die but how long will you live for? You start with a basic ship and go on a journey. Make decisions and create your own fate.  Complete events to gain more resources to survive longer.

Upgrade your ship through the various things you may encounter. Every game is totally unique, no game will ever be alike. 

Now with Screen Reader support and new "click to progress" mode.

Find planets, moons, nebula, aliens, pirates and traders! Share your score with friends!

We store no data. There is no connection from the game to any servers.
